https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fX3N3yMVwJPw60z8x0fCxxj80sJ.jpg Three intertwined stories to celebrate the the centenary of romance publishing house Mills & Boon. The first concerns Charles Boon's tempestuous relationship with his wife Mary, and is complemented by story lines set in the 1970s and the present day. Consuming Passion
